Creation or modification of email inbox.Data: Windows Event ID 4688, Windows Event ID 4104
Creation or modification of email inbox.Action: Search Windows Event Logs (Event ID 4688 or 4104 if available) for processes running PowerShell with arguments containing "New-InboxRule" or "Set-InboxRule". Analyze the user, source host, and timestamp. Use time series analysis to identify spikes in rule creation activity or creation outside normal working hours.

Abnormal access or modification of email.Data: Windows Event ID 4663, Windows Event ID 4688
Abnormal access or modification of email.Action: If file auditing is enabled, search Windows Event Logs (Event ID 4663) for access or modification attempts on common email client configuration files by unusual processes or user accounts. Use correlation analysis to link file access events to specific user logon sessions (Event ID 4624) and identify potentially compromised accounts.
